summary: Future focuses on forward-thinking concepts and evolving paradigms. It explores how traditional ideas are expanding and adapting to the digital age, particularly in organizational structures and ecosystem design. This theme encompasses innovative approaches to creating and managing decentralized networks that span both space and time. It encourages considering how current trends and technologies might shape the landscape of various fields, from biology to business, in the years to come.
excerpt: The article explores the evolution of ecosystem from biology to broader fields, discussing its expansion beyond physical boundaries in the digital age. It introduces ecosystem architecture as a new approach to designing thriving decentralized organizations.
